fullText: The new musical 'The Heart of Rock and Roll,' which opened Monday at the James Earl Jones Theater, is a jukebox musical built around the catalog of Huey Lewis and the News that manages to be both overstuffed and undernourished.
dtliExcerpt: The new musical 'The Heart of Rock and Roll,' which opened Monday at the James Earl Jones Theater, is a jukebox musical built around the catalog of Huey Lewis and the News that manages to be both overstuffed and undernourished.
